CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 10, 1953, page 4, reads: "Speaker's Table . . . at the annual Carver Day Luncheon, sponsered by the National Achievement Clubs, Inc., included the above group. Left to right: Rabbi Benjamin A. Lichter, Mayor David L. Lawrence, Mrs. Alma Illery, Dr. Merze Tate, guest speaker; Evans W. Engram, toastmaster and chairman, and the Rev. J. C. Hairston. Others at the speaker's table, although not in photo, include Mrs. David Alter, Mrs. Robert L. Vann, Mrs. Mary Clark, Aaron Levinson, Mrs. Goldie Hamilton, Mrs. Lilliam A. Friedberg, James Murray, Mrs. Irene Hogan and Russell Bradley. - Teenie Harris Photo." David L. Lawrence was Mayor of the City of Pittsburgh 1946-1959, Governor of Pennsylvania 1959-1963, and he died in 1966.
TitMainTitle: Group seated at banquet table, from left: priest, Rabbi Benjamin A. Lichter, Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence, Alma Illery, Dr. Merze Tate, Evans W. Engram, Rev. J. C. Hairston, and two women, gathered for Carver Day Luncheon, ballroom of Penn Sheraton Hotel
